system.effect: Orks may use the Intimidate Skill to perform all functions of the Command Skill when targeting Greenskins (Gretchin, Snotlings, Orks), affecting a number of targets up to their Strength Bonus. Doesn't work with Non-Greenskins.

description.value: Orks may use the Intimidate Skill to perform all functions of the Command Skill when targeting Greenskins (Gretchin, Snotlings, Orks), affecting a number of targets up to their Strength Bonus. Doesn't work with Non-Greenskins.
